basic.description: Metabolism of carbohydrates, amino acids and lipids. Role of coenzymes. Generation and storage of metabolic energy. Principles of regulatory mechanisms, membrane structure and function, hormone action, and cellular signalling.
basic.subject: BCHM
basic.title: Metabolism

extra.enrollment_requirement:
PREREQUISITE    BCHM 315/3.0. 
EXCLUSION    No more than 6.0 units from BCHM 310/6.0; BCHM 315/3.0; BCHM 316/3.0.
EXCLUSION    No more than 3.0 units from BCHM 102/3.0; BCHM 316/3.0
